# isPrintingAvailable

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports printing.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var isPrintingAvailable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the device supports printing, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. An application can show or hide any print buttons based on this value.

## Determining printability

- **canPrint(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether UIKit can print the contents of a data object.
- **canPrint(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether UIKit can print the file that the specified URL references.
- **printableUTIs**: Returns a set of the Uniform Type Identifiers for the types of data that UIKit can print.
